item.title: REPUBLIC FIRST BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: REPUBLIC FIRST BANCORP INC, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 26, 2022 had 53452 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
